definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Akkad Ge 10:10 [[וַתְּהִי רֵאשִׁית]] :[[וְכַלְנֶה בְּאֶרֶץ שִׁנְעָֽר]] ´[[מַמְלַכְתּוֹ בָּבֶל וְאֶרֶח וְא]]; name of a city in Northern (?) Babylonia; = Bab. Akkadi, mostly name of land or district, but also of city, v. Hilpr.:Freibrief Neb. I, col. ii, 1. 50; location uncertain; on possible identif. or confusion with Agade (A gate, A gane ?), city of Sargon I, cf. Dl:Pa 198 & K 19 f. COT Ge 10:10 Tiele:Gesch. i. 76 f.
